ingredients.ingredient: 1 (3.4 ounce) package instant pistachio pudding mix
1 (8 ounce) can crushed pineapple, with juice
½ (8 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed

cookingTips: Use pineapple with its juice to properly hydrate the instant pudding
Fold in ingredients gently to maintain the light, fluffy texture
Let sit refrigerated for 30 minutes before serving to set completely
enrichment.coachingPrompt: What is the best way to combine these ingredients without losing the fluffy texture?
